page.title: 17LEEDS ROADS SHOPS (CONT.)
page.content: It is hard to maintain a good level of business.Trade is not consistent and at some times in the year it is poor.Disaster struck the wine shops when last year a lorry carrying cattle careered through the shop front.Many customers went to other off-licences in the meantime and even though the shop has been fully restored trade is not very brisk.There are some excellent shops on the parade and many local inhabitants admitted that they preferred shopping there than going to the nearby town centre.Ingles the grocers provides a wide choice of fruit and vegetables and some exotic lines.There are two exclusive mens and womens boutiques next to each other which stock the latest fashions. Parking is bad because cars have to park at angles.
